T02TD2840E:181a-0: @181a * // dpal spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug la phyag 'tshal lo //
T02TD2840E:181a-1: sngags pa bde chen grong 'jug pas //
T02TD2840E:181a-2: bco brgyad ae dbyings phyag rgya bca' //
T02TD2840E:181a-3: g-yo ba mi g-yo bzung nas ni //
T02TD2840E:181a-4: lhag pa'i lha yi rnal 'byor bya //
T02TD2840E:181a-5: sprul pa'i gnas su ri yong 'dzin //
T02TD2840E:181a-6: ma lus byang chub sems bsdus gzugs //
T02TD2840E:181a-7: zla ba bzang ba bde ba che //
T02TD2840E:181a-8: 'od mdzad drod rlung srog bdag bsam //
T02TD2840E:181a-10: hr'i:/ lha dbang lhan cig skyes pa'i sku //
T02TD2840E:181a-11: zhal sbyor spyi gtsug gzi brjid bzang //
T02TD2840E:181a-12: sor bzhi pas ni bar chod bcas //
T02TD2840E:181a-14: sbyor mtshams dkar dmar rgyun lhung bas //
T02TD2840E:181a-15: bdag lus dri med byas nas su //
T02TD2840E:181a-16: thog mar gang bskyed phyis de bzhin //
T02TD2840E:181a-17: pad mchog zla ba bzang stobs bskyed //
T02TD2840E:181a-18: de nas kun sdud rdo rje yi //
T02TD2840E:181a-20: shing rta lam chen sbyang byas nas //
T02TD2840E:181a-21: lcags kyu lta bus drang byas la //
T02TD2840E:181a-22: gtum mo ye shes sbar ba'i mes //
T02TD2840E:181a-23: lte ba'i dkyil 'khor spros pas ni //
T02TD2840E:181a-24: me dpung la ni lan tshva bzhin //
T02TD2840E:181a-25: mi bzad skrar bcas gyen du 'phar //
T02TD2840E:181a-26: de tshe spyi gtsug rdo rje 'dzin //
T02TD2840E:181b-0: shes rab nyid la @181b bsdus byas la //
T02TD2840E:181b-1: de yi padmo kha phye bar //
T02TD2840E:181b-2: rnam shes bung ba gzhug par bya //
T02TD2840E:181b-3: skal ldan ngo bo nyid dbang du //
T02TD2840E:181b-4: bde ba mchog gis rgyud tshim zhing //
T02TD2840E:181b-5: chos kun rmi lam 'drar shes dang //
T02TD2840E:181b-6: gang bsgyur sems ston grub pa'i rdzas //
T02TD2840E:181b-7: de nas 'og gi pho brang lha //
T02TD2840E:181b-8: 'od zer dkrugs pa'i sbyor ba yis //
T02TD2840E:181b-9: zhu byas de ni gong mar bstim //
T02TD2840E:181b-10: thim gyur rang gnas brtan par 'dod //
T02TD2840E:181b-11: dpal lha'i grong khyer du 'jug pa rdzogs so//
